ej,leylj801,M,davib902,Foul ball non-call $the fifth pitch to Alcides Escobar bounced and struck the bat; the ball went by catcher Brayan Pena to the backstop; he did not chase the ball since it was a foul ball; Chris Getz advanced to 3B and then the Tigers argued; the umpires huddled but did not change the call; Tigers manager Jim Leyland argued with HP umpire Mike Muchlinski briefly but got angry when he returned to the bench and found out that it was a foul ball; Leyland held up four fingers to indicate how many umpires missed the call and was ejected by 1B umpire Bob Davidson
